comments: Total number of Eulerian circuits in rooted labeled multigraphs with n edges. - _Valery A. Liskovets_, Apr 07 2002
references: V. A. Liskovets, A note on the total number of Eulerian circuits in multigraphs. In press.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200

formula: E.g.f.: (1-6*x)^(-1/2).a(n) = 3^n*(2*n-1)!!.G.f.: 1/(1-3x/(1-6x/(1-9x/(1-12x/(1-15x/(1-18x/(1-21x/(1-24x/(1-... (continued fraction). - _Philippe Deléham_, Jan 08 2012a(n) = (-3)^n*sum_{k=0..n} 2^k*s(n+1,n+1-k), where s(n,k) are the Stirling numbers of the first kind, A048994. [_Mircea Merca_, May 03 2012]G.f.: T(0), where T(k) = 1 - 3*x*(k+1)/( 3*x*(k+1) - 1/T(k+1) ); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Oct 24 2013
mathematica: s=1;lst={s};Do[s+=n*s;AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 2, 5!, 6}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 08 2008 *)Table[Product[6k+3,{k,0,n-1}],{n,0,20}] (* or *) Table[6^(n-1) Pochhammer[ 1/2,n-1],{n,21}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 09 2012 *)
